description: Dashboard shows FluentBit's metrics about its work using metrics from /v1 metrics endpoint

panels.description: Show count of active FluentBit pods in selected namespace
panels.title: Active pods

panels.description: Show total count of bytes which FluentBit read or received any other ways. Total calculate as summary by all pods and all inputs for selected namespace.
panels.title: Total input bytes

panels.description: Show total records which FluentBit read or received any other ways. Total calculate as summary by all pods and all inputs for selected namespace.
panels.title: Total input records/s

panels.description: Show total count of bytes which FluentBit sent to any endpoints. Total calculate as summary by all pods and all outputs for selected namespace.
panels.title: Total output bytes

panels.description: Show total records which FluentBit sent to any endpoints. Total calculate as summary by all pods and all outputs for selected namespace.
panels.title: Total output records/s

panels.description: Show total count of retries which FluentBit execute to send logs in configured outputs. Total calculate as summary by all pods for selected namespace.
panels.title: Total retries/s

panels.description: Show total count of errors in FluentBit during read, parse or send logs. Total calculate as summary by all pods for selected namespace.
panels.title: Total errors/s

panels.description: Show maximum version among all FluentBit pods in selected namespace.
panels.title: Version

panels.description: Show information about version, edition and uptime for all FluentBit pods in selected namespace
panels.title: FluentBit info

panels.description: Show how much bytes FluentBit read or received
panels.title: Input bytes/s

panels.description: Show how much bytes FluentBit sent to any outputs
panels.title: Output bytes/s

panels.description: Show how much records FluentBit read or received from any sources
panels.title: Input records

panels.description: Show how much files FluentBit open to read logs
panels.title: Files opened

panels.description: Show much files FluentBit closed after complete read logs from these files
panels.title: Files closed

panels.description: Show how much files which FluentBit reads were rotated
panels.title: Files rotated

panels.description: Show how much records were added with using filters in FluentBit
panels.title: Fiter added records

panels.description:
Show how much records were emitted with using filters in FluentBit.
The `Emitter` is an internal FluentBit plugin that allows other components of the pipeline to emit custom records. On this case `rewrite_tag` creates an Emitter instance to use it exclusively to emit records, on that way we can have a granular control of who is emitting what.
panels.title: Filter emitted records

panels.description: Show how much records were dropped during processing records in FluentBit
panels.title: Filter dropped records

panels.description: Show how much processed records were sent to any outputs
panels.title: Output records

panels.description: Show how much records were dropped by output plugin
panels.title: Dropped records

panels.description: Show how much errors occurred during send messages to any outputs
panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Show how much retries FluentBit execute to send messages to any output
panels.title: Retries

panels.description: Show number of abandoned batches because the maximum number of re-tries was reached.
panels.title: Failed retries

panels.description: Show how much bytes FluentBit read or received by plugin. In legend you can see a plugin name.
panels.title: Input bytes/s for $pod

panels.description: Show how much bytes FluentBit sent to any outputs. In legend you can see a plugin name.
panels.title: Output bytes/s for $pod

panels.description: Show how much records FluentBit read or received from any sources
panels.title: Input records/s for $pod

panels.description: Show how much records were dropped during processing records in FluentBit. In legend you can see a plugin name.
panels.title: Filter dropped records/s for $pod

panels.description: Show how much processed records were sent to any outputs
panels.title: Output records/s for $pod

panels.description: Show how much files FluentBit open to read logs
panels.title: Open files for $pod

panels.description: Show much files FluentBit closed after complete read logs from these files and files which FluentBit reads were rotated
panels.title: Closed/rotated files for $pod

panels.description: Show how much records were added with using filters in FluentBit. In legend you can see a plugin name.
panels.title: Fiter added records for $pod

panels.description:
Show how much records were emitted with using filters in FluentBit.
The `Emitter` is an internal FluentBit plugin that allows other components of the pipeline to emit custom records. On this case `rewrite_tag` creates an Emitter instance to use it exclusively to emit records, on that way we can have a granular control of who is emitting what. In legend you can see a plugin name.
panels.title: Filter emitted records for $pod

panels.description: Show how much errors occurred during send messages to any outputs. In legend you can see a plugin name.
panels.title: Error/s for $pod

panels.description: Show how much retries FluentBit execute to send messages to any output and how much of these retries were failed. In legend you can see a plugin name.
panels.title: Retries/fails for $pod

title: FluentBit v1
